Pawtucket.Wheeler School:
The Wheeler School is a coeducational independent day school located on the East Side of Providence, Rhode Island, U. S. The school serves students from the nursery level through twelfth-grade.


== History ==


=== Mary C. Wheeler ===
School founder, Mary Colman Wheeler was born in Concord, Massachusetts, on May 15, 1846. She graduated from Concord High School and Abbot Academy in Andover, Massachusetts.
